# India Activates Nyoma Airbase Near China Border in Ladakh: A Strategic Game-Changer

In a significant strategic move, India has fully activated the Nyoma Airbase in eastern Ladakh, marking a major milestone in bolstering its defense infrastructure along the Line of Actual Control (LAC) with China.
